A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Has the BEST visual splendor of any Star Wars film! But\, it fails to use any of the story setup left by TFA and destroys all continuity of all the preexisting SW Films\, nor does it leave you with any hope; as this film would have you believe\, that there is any plan for another installment. This is a film awash with an agenda\, one painfully evident takes precedence over the telling of a good story; a story that you can see once existed\, but has been thoroughly eradicated. Without a story there is nothing to drive character progression. Without character progression there is no reason to invest in the characters: new and old. Without that character investment it is hard\, or impossible\, to enjoy that visual splendor!
